name: Fractured Nursery Rhymes Multiple Choice Quiz | Fractured Words | 15 Questions

questions.text: Libel muss misfit sad honor tough fit
questions.correct: Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on a tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on a tuffett & Little Miss Muffet sat on her tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on her tuffett
questions.explanation:
Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on a tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on a tuffett & Little Miss Muffet sat on her tuffet & Little Miss Muffett sat on her tuffett.

	...eating her curds and whey. Along came a spider who sat down beside 'er and frightened Miss Muffet away.

questions.text: Jag gone gel when topsy hell
questions.correct: Jack and Jill went up the hill & Jack and Jill went up a hill
questions.explanation:
Jack and Jill went up the hill & Jack and Jill went up a hill.

	...to fetch a pail of water. Jack fell down and broke his crown and Jill came tumbling after!

questions.text: Hay dribble dabble the cabin the fable
questions.correct: Hey diddle diddle the cat and the fiddle & Hey diddle diddle the cat in the fiddle
questions.explanation:
Hey diddle diddle the cat and the fiddle & Hey diddle diddle the cat in the fiddle.

	...the cow jumped over the moon. The little dog laughed to see such sport and the dish ran away with the spoon.

questions.text: Barbara block ship half ewe Annie wolves
questions.correct: Baa baa black sheep have you any wool & Ba ba black sheep have you any wool
questions.explanation:
Baa baa black sheep have you any wool & Ba ba black sheep have you any wool.

	Yes sir! Yes sir! Three bags full. One for my master, one for my dame, and one for the little boy who lives in the lane.

questions.text: Murray header lable lamp lid dull lump led dill limp
questions.correct: Mary had a little lamb little lamb little lamb
questions.explanation:
Mary had a little lamb little lamb little lamb.

	...Mary had a little lamb whose fleece was white as snow.

questions.text: Buy Bobby bantering Dudley's gunny haunting
questions.correct: Bye Baby Bunting Daddy's gone a hunting & Bye Baby Bunting Daddys gone a hunting
questions.explanation:
Bye Baby Bunting Daddy's gone a hunting & Bye Baby Bunting Daddys gone a hunting.

	...to find a little rabbit skin to put the Baby Bunting in.

questions.text: Pea deer pee dear pomp Ken heater
questions.explanation:
Peter Peter pumpkin eater.

	...had a wife and couldn't keep her. Put her in a pumpkin shell and there he kept her very well.

questions.text: Merry Murray trite kin Terry howl dose yore garter growl
questions.correct: Mary Mary quite contrary how does your garden grow
questions.explanation:
Mary Mary quite contrary how does your garden grow.

	With silver bells and cockle shells and pretty maids all in a row.

questions.correct: Jack be nimble Jack be quick
questions.explanation:
Jack be nimble Jack be quick.

	...Jack jump over the candlestick. (Or, Jacques jam plover the Ken doll sick.)

questions.text: Jacques spat cud deep nonfat hiss why cod deed Noreen
questions.correct: Jack Sprat could eat no fat his wife could eat no lean & Jack Spratt could eat no fat his wife could eat no lean
questions.explanation:
Jack Sprat could eat no fat his wife could eat no lean & Jack Spratt could eat no fat his wife could eat no lean.

	...they licked the platter clean!

questions.text: Cold mutter hop bird when toady kippered
questions.correct: Old Mother Hubbard went to the cupboard & Old Mother Hubbard went to her cupboard
questions.explanation:
Old Mother Hubbard went to the cupboard & Old Mother Hubbard went to her cupboard.

	...to get her poor dog a bone. But when she got there the cupboard was bare, and so the poor dog had none.

questions.text: We wily wind key wrens truly tune
questions.correct: Wee Willy Winky runs through the town & Wee Willy Winkie runs through the town & Wee Willie Winkie runs through the town & Wee Willie Winky runs through the town
questions.explanation:
Wee Willy Winky runs through the town & Wee Willy Winkie runs through the town & Wee Willie Winkie runs through the town & Wee Willie Winky runs through the town.

	...upstairs and downstairs in his nightgown. Rapping at the windows, calling through the locks: 'Are the children in their beds? It's almost eight o'clock!'

questions.text: Huck curry Diggory duck the moose wren uppity cluck
questions.correct: Hickory dickory dock the mouse ran up the clock
questions.explanation:
Hickory dickory dock the mouse ran up the clock.

	The clock struck one, the mouse ran down. Hickory, dickory, dock! By the way, Diggory is the last name of Cedric, a Harry Potter character.

questions.text: (This one starts in the middle.) Width rinse honor fringes and bulls undertows
questions.correct: with rings on her fingers and bells on her toes
questions.explanation:
with rings on her fingers and bells on her toes.

	...she shall have music wherever she goes. (It starts: Ride a cock horse to Banbury Cross to see a fine lady upon a white horse.)

questions.text: Beater pie purr piqued a Peggy speckled hep hearse
questions.correct: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers
questions.explanation:
Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers.

	...then how many pickled peppers did Peter Piper pick?
